sentences.en: As a player he was unselfish, a true team man.
sentences.cn: 作为一名选手，他毫无私念，真正把自己摆在团队中。

sentences.en: But as with other charitable bodies, these figures mask the true picture.
sentences.cn: 但和其他慈善机构一样，这些数字掩盖了实情。

sentences.en: dreams can come true.
sentences.cn: 梦想可以成真。

sentences.en: He argues that he is the true candidate of change.
sentences.cn: 他争辩说他才是真正能带来变革的候选人。

sentences.en: He said it was true that a collision had happened.
sentences.cn: 他说真的发生了冲突。

sentences.en: How do I know that he will be true to his word?
sentences.cn: 我怎么知道他会信守诺言呢？

sentences.en: I admired him as a true scientist and hard worker.
sentences.cn: 我钦佩他是个真正的科学家和勤奋工作的人。

sentences.en: It’s generally true to say that fewer people are needed nowadays.
sentences.cn: 总的来说现在需要的人员少了。

sentences.en: It's true she gets madly impatient with him, but what mother doesn't?
sentences.cn: 她确实对他极其不耐烦，但哪个母亲不是这样呢？

sentences.en: No, honestly, it’s a true story .
sentences.cn: 不，真的，这是一个真实的故事。

sentences.en: Only inside do you appreciate the church's true grandeur.
sentences.cn: 只有深入其中，你才能真正欣赏教堂的富丽堂皇。

sentences.en: Students decide if statements are true or false .
sentences.cn: 由学生来判断说法正确还是错误。

sentences.en: take care not to pull the frame out of true.
sentences.cn: 小心别把框子给弄歪了。

sentences.en: The jury is out on whether or not this is true.
sentences.cn: 这是否属实仍未得出定论。

sentences.en: The opening scenes of this movie are just not true to life.
sentences.cn: 这部电影开场的几幕真是太假了。

sentences.en: The results appear to hold true (= still be correct ) for other countries.
sentences.cn: 这些结果在其他国家似乎同样正确。

sentences.en: There are those who argue that true independent advice is unattainable.
sentences.cn: 有一些人认为真正独立的意见是不存在的。

sentences.en: They were decked out in tracksuits, seemingly to dissimulate their true function.
sentences.cn: 他们都穿着田径服，似乎想掩饰他们的真实职能。

sentences.en: This may be true but it is only part of the story.
sentences.cn: 这可能是真的，但它并不是事情的全部。

sentences.en: Too much salt masks the true flavour of the food.
sentences.cn: 太多的盐会盖住食物本来的味道。

sentences.en: true as Bob, I nearly went right through the windscreen.
sentences.cn: 我差点从挡风玻璃那里飞了出去，这是真的。

sentences.en: true to type, they took it well.
sentences.cn: 不出所料，他们很好地领会了其中的意思。

sentences.en: We shall see that this is not entirely true.
sentences.cn: 我们会明白这并非全是真的。
